website_summaries.verdict: Fun-loving adults and teenagers alike will appreciate the ultra-luxurious feel of this stylish pillow.
pros: Extremely soft and thick fabric for ultimate comfort
Handle built at top of pillow for easy transport
Sturdy design allows pillow to stand on its own
cons: Color not true to online picture
Some owners had initial issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: Lime Shagalicious is SNUGGY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bedrest! It's super plush, regular sized, and much bigger than Brentwood's "Poodle" bedrest. Please note they both have product measurements of 26x18x18. Please see my pics: Lime is the shag & blue is the poodle. (Their poodle bedrest would be more appropriate for a small child.)
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with shedding
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a pink bed rest and was very excited to see this being sold by Amazon. Read through the reviews and even saw a couple of questions regarding shedding, which I was concerned about. The responses said, no shedding. Sorry, but this indeed DOES SHED. Its not extreme, but when I rubbed different material over the bed rest fine pink strands were left behind. I clearly saw it when I rubbed a black top over it. The last thing I want to be bothered with is the need to use a lint brush on my clothing to wipe away fine pink fibers. My search continues....
customer_reviews.author: Sun Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: The seam split right on the top. My daughter barely used it. It seems it was not very good quality stitching.
customer_reviews.author: gawfour

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. This is the second one I've purchased. I wore out this first one. I use it to lounge and sleep with. I've washed it 3 times since I've had it and never had an issue with it in the washer or the dryer. It doesn't shed, is a good size, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisG

customer_reviews.title: Lime Shagalicious " Short Stuffed " !
customer_reviews.text: Lime Shagalicious improperly stuffed and continues to degrade. Waited too long for return and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: HAWKCHASER

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled when we got this because it was so soft and the color was spot on. Within two weeks the seems began to rip. It is so cheaply made. Quite a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chester2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry, supportive
customer_reviews.text: My sister just had major surgery, and had to be propped up for several weeks afterwards. I bought this, and she had a couple of wedge pillows for her arms, and between the two of them she was very comfortable. she was able to carry this without much difficulty b/c of the loop on the top of the pillow, and was able to stay between the "arms" easily. Eventually the stuffing smushed down a bit, but that's expected in this kind of pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable and surprisingly doesn't shed (it's a super soft acrylic ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for when he's playing PS4 on his bed so that when we sit together there's enough padding against the wall for each of us. It's very comfortable and surprisingly doesn't shed (it's a super soft acrylic shaggy fabric; I expected it to shed like mad). Worth its cost.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mell

customer_reviews.title: Super-soft, Super-fuzzy, Good size!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly soft fabric, good size, and my daughter loves it. Some of the other bed rests are apparently much smaller and only good for kids. This is a decent size for kids or adults. The "shag" part is from the length of the fibers. They're a little bit reminiscent of Sully from Monsters Inc. It's not a subtle color, so that's something to keep in mind if it matters to you. It happens to match my daughters decor very well, so she doesn't mind at all. But an adult might not have bedroom decor that matches.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Comfort
customer_reviews.text: cozy, super soft, comfortable, lightweight and supportive. Able to transport anywhere and can stand on its own. In reading reviews, some found bedrest to shed, but had no problem. Eliminates problem of having to prop up lots of pillows. Appears exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She has arthritis in her back and has a hard time getting up off of the couch. She used to put the couch pillows behind her, but they would go flat, or move. She uses this behind her now, and said its perfect. Its so soft, the dog steals her spot whenever she gets up.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love it! Color is almost exactly as shown, maybe a bit more neon. It arrived fully stuffed and ready to use which is what made me pick it over another option I was considering and I am glad I did. Fabric is really soft. Have used it a few nights in a row and it is comfortable but supportive and doesn't squish down. Only four stars because the zipper pull to remove the cover was broken off before I even took it out of the protective bag it was shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable back pillow
customer_reviews.text: This back pillow is fairly durable, only complaint there is that when the tag was torn out, it left a hole rather than tearing the tag. The pillow still holds together great though. Been using it for about half a year and do not regret the purchase. Also very soft and comfortable to lean against.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Only issue is that it can be a little "too" soft in the sense that it doesn't provide as much support as it could (essentially, it's not as stiff as other back rests) and I have no idea how to clean it. Dry cleaners won't take it, and there is no way it will go in the washer/dryer, so I guess spot cleaning is the only way. This wouldn't be an issue, but the back rest is very shag like, making it a little harder to clean than a more traditional, smoother felt backrest. Overall, decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hot pink, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really Disappointed. This pillow is more of a purple-pinkish (fuschia), than a hot pink color. I was excited for the bright pink color. I have had this in my wish list for a while. It is still very soft and comfortable. But it feels cheaply made. Kept it anyways, but it looks very different from the pictures. I wouldn’t mind the low quality, especially considering the price, if it was the color I was expecting. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bergene

customer_reviews.title: Garbage seams, good back support
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow, GARBAGE STITCHING! within less than a day, the side arm had split open at the seam and brown curly stuffing is now coming out slowly. I’m still going to use it until I can’t anymore because it’s a great back support, but seriously??? Terrible quality. It’s not difficult to reinforce a seam, y’all.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It's better stuffed than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Luckily it doesn't squish down right away like some pillows. It's fairly well stuffed and heavy. It's also quite big. Hopefully this will help using the laptop in bed w a tray table.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels1234

customer_reviews.title: Useful but messy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my product came in damaged. It is still usable, but the small strands of fabric keep getting all over my bed. I still enjoy using the bed rest, as it is very useful, but it is a hassle to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Rakib Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not meant to last unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I was shopping for a back pillow for my daughters reading nook. However After just two uses the threads pulled apart, I did so them back but unfortunately that isn't something I should have to do after that little use. Love everything else about it though
customer_reviews.author: Prairiemom

customer_reviews.title: Eh... Its.. OK
customer_reviews.text: Eh... it looks good... nice and shaggy and inviting looking, however a few days after I received mine the seam split at the bottom and the guts started to fall out.... it also sags really easily and needs to be primped and puffed up often. I dont think I would buy this again but I could have just received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: elobrien75

customer_reviews.title: It's still in great condition and works to prop you up in bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item eight months ago and am leaning on it as I am writing this review. It's still in great condition and works to prop you up in bed. It is taller than other similar products out there, but I still wish it were a little bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: blubbph

customer_reviews.title: but we've had this for months and it is in great shape. So cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I've had others that have fallen apart, but we've had this for months and it is in great shape. So cuddly, too!
customer_reviews.author: RERCAESWX

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Soft material. Its the perfect size to use while recovering from a chest infection, and you have to sleep propped up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bradley

customer_reviews.title: IT'S SO FLUFFY I'M GONNA DIE!
customer_reviews.text: Big, adorable, and soft! I am an artist who likes to draw sitting upright on my bed, and my normal pillow propping my back up just was not working. This thing is perfect for sitting up in bed, not flimsy or scratchy at all. The hot pink color is so cute, and the fur on it is soft and cuddly. It's a little hefty, but it's basically 3 square feet of pure fluff, so I can't blame it. No problems to report so far, since this kind of pillow doesn't usually get roughed up easily. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leecen3

customer_reviews.title: Extra-relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Before this one, all "study pillows" were pretty much the same to me. All they need to do is be sturdy enough to stay put when I rest on it, and keep its stuffing inside. This pillow goes the extra mile, the fabric is so comfortable, so soft and relaxing. This pillow does its job and then some. If you're in the market for one, I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: MarieCW

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter a few years back. She sleeps on it every night and calls it her "fluffy". My daughter was 6 at the time and was extremely pleased to get a pillow this large and well...fluffy. I would buy this again if "fluffy" was ever damaged or if I had another daughter. I have used it once or twice myself and I can say it is comfortable for a short time, as I have spinal damage I don't lay on it long. A++ on the OMGoose look on her face when she got it, A++ on durability and comfort. Highly recommend for Dads, you will be your daughter's hero!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Alpine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tween
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fuzzy, just as pictured. Really made for kids and their lighter body weight....added a matching lap board and had a great gift for the tween who loves to lounge while drawing, reading or IPad..
customer_reviews.author: A. Fahrenheim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for call the kids in my family for Christmas. They loved them so much!! Use them to read in bed or play on tablet or phone . I will definitely be reordering more
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 8 year old...you get what you see! It really is super soft and comfortable. Great for reading...color is on point! Would be great for any age
customer_reviews.author: Suzy P

customer_reviews.title: So big,tall,pretty and oh so comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! i bought this for my daughter, and oh it is so so big and fluffy! Ive been stealing it from her while shes at school. Its big and taller than expected. I don't know about the other colors, i bought the lime..so pretty too! Will buy more for me and my 4 year old son, he brings his books in her room and plops on it, until she kicks him out!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Daughter can't stop hugging on it long enough to utilize it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bedrest. Daughter reads a lot and bought this for her birthday. She loves it. Been hugging on it and running about trying it all over the house. Great product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lars1y

customer_reviews.title: Sunk down 6 inches in one week
customer_reviews.text: After one week of use it sank 6 inches. If this was for a kid that would be okay, not great, but okay. But for an adult, that's completely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: The blue fuzzies stick to everything and it is also one huge ball of static Serious static.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH BRADICICH

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandkids. Because the kids are small and not very heavy they can lean against them and get comfortable, but I found them way too small and slippery. I frankly wouldn't recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Drumlin

customer_reviews.title: The zipper has broken and we haven’t used it but 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So the zipper has busted and it’s 4 days past the time I can return it.. I am super mad and sad because our son loved it.. he only received this item 2 weeks ago.. it sat in my closet for 2 weeks before he received it is a gift.. will you make it right?
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pefect for bed rest
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who was laid up for a few months. He still uses it even now that he's up & about again. I think I will get one for myself, too. The color is spot-on if not a bit brighter, and it is soft as can be. No shedding to speak of and it stays fluffy. It's not very firm, but we didn't require that as the headboard did that job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: sweetweaver

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my son for christmas. It ripped the same afternoon. I exchanged it for a new one. It has ripped AGAIN. The handle stitching is HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: KellyMinor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my daughters... she loves it!!! I had to buy another one for my other daughter. Great quality, beautiful bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lyvkirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and a Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy!! It saves my back when sitting on the floor with my puppy. It has a nice high backrest comparatively. Plus the little arm things work as a last minute pillow for a floor nap! It is a really obnoxious lime green though. I might've chosen a different color. But it's not unbearable and in the right decor would be quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: California Art

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kid's reading or relaxing pillow.
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. Super plush and soft. Great pillows for reading or relaxing. I have not had trouble with it shedding as others mentioned. It's a great pillow and I would buy again. Lime color is neon and brighter than as pictured. Nice purchase. Seems sturdy and durable. I expect it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be made better. Tears at the seams very easily. Hadn’t even used it yet when it tour
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately it ripped at the seams. I called Amazon and they sent me a replacement. Almost immediately it ripped at the seams. Not at all happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Maceo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I am not a small girl, so I was worried about the reviews stating it was too small. It is a little short in back, but I think it is the same size as the other products I have had like this over the years. I is VERY soft and comfortable. It may be a bit warm as we enter summer, but it has been great thus far
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scentist

customer_reviews.title: Cute but defective product, TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: The shag material and the color are really great, and my daughter loved it. However, I had to return this item twice because there were rips in the seams of the arms. TWICE! We were very pleased that amazon took care of exchanging the first one and the second one came very quickly. As soon as we took it out of the box, we noticed a place on the seam where it was not sewn correctly. It is really too bad because it is a really cute product. We have a different material and color from this same company also, and it seems to be fine. (It is the poodle material instead of the shag.)
customer_reviews.author: Annie H.

customer_reviews.title: this was a good deal. I like the funky pink shagginess
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a good deal. I like the funky pink shagginess, and while it could have more stuffing and better quality, it's really as good or better than the price justifies. If you want a cheap and funky reading pillow, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: mary m

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but too small and poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: A little bit too short for me and not as large as expected. Packaged poorly without any plastic to cover it so it was full of dust when it arrived. But it is comfortable enough and I love the material and the texture. Its squishiness is perfect so you won't feel tired for relaxing on it for too long. So minus two starts because of the size and the packaging. But other than that, it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sugiharto

customer_reviews.title: Shagalicious
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy and fluffy. Will hold its shape. Good size to lean against. Wish it were available in more colors
customer_reviews.author: Teleute37

customer_reviews.title: Poor back support!
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice but I think it's good for decoration only. Poor back support! Fortunately I didn't pay full price to get this thing as I got reward points from the Amazon Chase card so I ended up paying $0.70 cents for this. Otherwise I would have returned it and get my refund!
customer_reviews.author: BETTY

customer_reviews.title: Holes appear out of the blue in thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Had this about 8 months. Used it for what out is intended for, as a back rest in bed or a couch. A three inch hole suddenly appeared in one of the arms, not on a seem. The fabric that ripped is pretty thin so I can't even repair it. Hope that no more holes show up since I can no longer return it. Like the feel but not worth purchasing if it only lasts one year.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, i bought it for my daughter but I ended up using on the couch, she's still using her old one, I'll order her another one of these soon LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old Son he uses it while gaming and watching T..V. He loves it. It is very well made and Amazingly Soft
customer_reviews.author: DONALD ENGSTROM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft fabric and very comfortable pillow. It provides the perfect amount of support to sit up in bed and watch some shows
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Just great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES this bedrest!! She wanted something for her bed to read with or watch TV on and this is perfect!! She's 5'1 and 100 lbs and it fits her great and probably will for many years to come...In fact, I think it would be good for any size or age! It's totally soft too!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Arizona

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfy, but still holds up. My son loves this! It was shipped fast, priced right, and described accurately; might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Pbeau

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this wild green pillow! It is soft to the touch and provides good support. It can be used right away. The arms are shorter, but so am I so it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Sutherlin

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults.
customer_reviews.text: This is better suited for a child. It is small and not firm. The finish is irritating to the skin beacuse the fiber is long and thin, not short and thick as expected.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable! Great product and great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product that is very soft and comfortable and a good generous size! Great price as well! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Turney

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture, but not as heavy duty as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture, but not as heavy duty as I was hoping for. It's very squishy and not much better than just propping up a pillow. Does not provide much support for the back or arms, and is a little smaller than I had hoped. Still, it's pretty comfortable and gets used.
customer_reviews.author: Habimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my young son. He loves it! Loves the soft, shaggy feel. Provides support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kris m.

customer_reviews.title: Some shedding..
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pillow of this type I've ever had! Though, I'm giving 4 stars because of shedding. Pretty sure ive inhaled some of the fluff while sleeping...
customer_reviews.author: Clair Moore

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little stiff but though time it’ll loosen up perfect for my back!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The material this is made of would be great for kids rooms
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer a cover that would not shed. The material this is made of would be great for kids rooms, etc... but not for an adult wnating to incorporate this with living room furniture as it sheds on things. I would have given it a full 5 rating had it not been for cover. The funciton of the rest is fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Redheaded Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bedrest for my granddaughter for her birthday and she loves it! She is 10 and reads a lot in bed. It is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi424

customer_reviews.title: MY GRANDSON LOVED IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a grandson who I had heard earlier in the year wanted one of these bedrests for his bed. Well, his favorite color is green.........so I knew I couldn't miss with this one! HE LOVED IT!! I also used this gift as an opportunity to encourage him to read more in the privacy of his own bed and "bedrest" :) This item arrived in a huge box, but was packaged well and intact !
customer_reviews.author: mimito5x

customer_reviews.title: Big, furry and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm stuck on the couch for a month following foot surgery, and purchased this to make my back more comfortable during the long weeks. The backrest definitely does the job. It's soft and large enough to support me comfortably. The furry fabric is a bit hot, however.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too soft
customer_reviews.text: Very plush. Too soft because the pillow is too squishy and when a check leans on it, the pillow collapses
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's like a big, cozy, turquoise hug :) Great for reading or texting in bed, super cute and fluffy. Pretty sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Anne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cute. Perfect for watching tv in bed. Color is true to the picture. Gives support but not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: Sooo fluffy
customer_reviews.text: So soft! My cat likes to knead it because it feels so fluffy. I just wish it had a little more oomph for back support, but otherwise it’s very nice to sit against.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: These pillows should only be maybe $10 a piece they're not very comfortable nor are they very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a kid bed
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my grand daughter fits with the color of her room. Nice size for a kid bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good support. The green one is mine
customer_reviews.text: Soft, cuddly, good support. The green one is mine, the blue one for my granddaughter! Both loved. Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft And plush and it great at supporting my back
customer_reviews.author: Embassie L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Helps being comfortable sitting when acid reflux acts up and have to sleep sitting up
customer_reviews.text: It warm and fuzzy and I am very comfortable sitting up in bed and it helps when my acid reflux acts up and I need to sleep sitting up
customer_reviews.author: Evany

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter now I want one
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lenard

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This bed rest is too cute and extremely comfortable... the shag fabric is so soft it reminds me of my kitties fur! Due to severe chronic pain, I often spend a lot of time in bed and this will definitely help in keeping my neck and back supported while watching TV, which prevents headaches! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: FairyKat

customer_reviews.title: It's ok-not great
customer_reviews.text: Has a huge hole right where the top handle/loop is. While I could have boxed it up and shipped it back I decided to just live with it. I would have liked it a little firmer. Overall it's okay. Not something I will take with me when I move though. I will be getting a firmer one (without holes!) when I move.
customer_reviews.author: Shariike

customer_reviews.title: IT IS WHAT I WANTED I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: LITTLE AWKWARD BUT LOVE COLOR AND WORKS OK .......................NICE FOR ANY GIRLS ROOM
customer_reviews.author: vickie gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, bright color, and it has good filling. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this soft pillow, just ordered another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: melissa L latham

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Fun, Soft & Squishy!
customer_reviews.text: This Pillow is perfect for my little grandson...he loves it! It is super soft and gives him just enough support to sit up and watch TV or play some games! He is 6.
customer_reviews.author: A Widling

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow. It was soft and perfect for watching Netflix in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Opera124

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the buy so comfortable. It had plenty of support for me. It is perfect for dorm rooms and for anyone of any age. Only negative is that it sheds but that's what you get with a soft fur-like item at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my granddaughter's room in college.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter's room in college. She loves it because her bedspread is black and lime green. They don't have any sitting chairs in their room so this serves as her relaxing seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It’s one awesome item. It is so comfortable to watch TV or read in bed
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bee Honey

customer_reviews.title: Nice back rest
customer_reviews.text: Nice back rest ! Been using it ! But badly can’t wash the cover ! Cracked on the little hand area :( wish you guys make a zipper and be washable for next products !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yan Luo

customer_reviews.title: SO FLUFFY!!
customer_reviews.text: SO FLUFFY!! This pillow backrest is so fluffy and soft our Granddaughter loves to sit on our bed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my sister because she is always ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister because she is always reading or playing sudoku before bed. She loves it. She also likes the soft texture of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fulton

customer_reviews.title: so comfy
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift . the quality was better then others I bought elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Timaud

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: My mother was very happy with this pillow. She sleep's much better & it is super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely full-size bedrest. The color is extremely vibrant and the plush fur is incredibly soft to the touch. It has a good weight to it, not enough to be truly heavy, but more than enough to keep it from flattening anytime soon. I read in bed a ton so this is a must have for me, and very easy on my back. I have not experienced any shedding problems with this pillow, but I have noted that others have. Also, I am an adult, (A plus sized one at that) and I find that this is very supportive. Like others here I do wish it came in a few more colors, but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was beautiful and comfy for the 1st week then looked horrible and would not stay fluffed, sad
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Husband pillow
customer_reviews.text: It’s really fuzzy and plush and giant but it’s smells funny and the fur is really greasy feeling. I wish I didn’t purchase this. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: mpurtz

customer_reviews.title: Great for a young person
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color. However, it slides around on me. I had shoulder surgery and thought it might work, but I needed something more substantial. My three year old niece loves it. I think I will give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: L. Covington

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this. It's really soft and super comfortable. I've had it about 3 weeks and used it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Freakin' awesome
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh. Freakin' awesome. And I get to say "Shagalicious" all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: This is fashionable and supportive for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased fir my granddaughter and loved the color and especially the softness.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Dykas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last....
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute at first but its very soft & lost it's shape within a few weeks.... provides no support. My dog loves it, though, lol.
customer_reviews.author: smokeyb42

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little girls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my little niece and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna P

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Nice and fluffy and came nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who is 8. She loved it. Nice and fluffy and came nicely packaged. Wished it was a little bigger but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: The handle on top is great for moving it from room to room (living room ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bedrest. The handle on top is great for moving it from room to room (living room for gaming and back to bed for reading). The color is vibrant and the fabric/threads are extremely soft! Highly recommend this product. We also have it in blue :-)
customer_reviews.author: SavvyMom

product_meta.title: Brentwood Originals 1957 Shagalisciuos Bedrest, Turquoise
product_meta.description: Color:TurquoiseHal Arden founded Brentwood Originals in Los Angeles, California in 1958 selling decorative pillows and bedspreads. Our product offering has since expanded to include indoor and outdoor decorative pillows, cushions, chair pads, poufs, throws, bean bags, and more! We design and develop a variety of textures, patterns and colours with our supplier partners all over the world to manufacture products that fit any lifestyle, room, patio and home. While our product offering has evolved, Brentwood’s longstanding commitment to our customers is to ethically and sustainably design, source and deliver quality product. The pursuit to fulfil our promise is an ongoing continuum of sourcing and training within our own facilities and those of our overseas suppliers, and implementing industry-leading best practices in transparency and rigorous quality control. Freshen up your living space with a pop of colour or pattern - Buy Brentwood today.
feature_bullets: EXCELLENT SUPPORT for your neck, back, and arms while watching TV, reading, or relaxing on your bed, couch, or even ground.
SIMPLE TO TRANSPORT with the sturdy handle attached on the top of the bedrest to bring to your next lounging location.
VERSATILE FOR ANY SITUATION whether it be at home in the living room, or hanging out in the dorm room, the Brentwood Originals bedrest will always be your comfortable companion.
EASY TO CLEAN by spot cleaning with only a damp cloth
